news.title: Bohemian F.C. and Fontaines D.C. jersey collaboration raises €199,000 for Palestine
news.summary: Fontaines D.C. have worn the jersey while performing, and it has grown increasingly popular among fans.

news.title: CMAT stars in new BBC Radio 6 Music Artist in Residence – AAA episode
news.summary: In the episode, CMAT discusses the writing and production process behind her upcoming album EURO-COUNTRY.

news.title: Tebi Rex announce last ever show and release date for upcoming album Fin
news.summary: They will play The Button Factory on December 22.

news.title: For Those I Love at Spindizzy (Photos)
Connolly Books to host KNEECAP Solidarity Seisiún on Mo Chara's court date
news.summary: Find more details about the event below.

news.title: Sweet Jayne issues appeal after Fender Jaguar guitar stolen from car in Dublin
news.summary: The thief was caught on CCTV fleeing the scene around 7am

news.title: The Visionaries Choir announce National Concert Hall gig
news.summary: The show comes in aid of the research charity Fighting Blindness.

news.title: U2 issue statement on Gaza: “The band is pledged to contribute our support by donating to Medical Aid For Palestinians”
news.summary: "The blocking of humanitarian aid and now plans for a military takeover of Gaza City has taken the conflict into uncharted territory," wrote the band on Instagram. "We are not experts in the politics of the region, but we want our audience to know where we each stand."

news.title: RTÉ confirms premiere date for The Traitors Ireland
news.summary: Siobhan McSweeney will host The Traitors Ireland and Kevin McGahern has been announced to take reins of the companion series The Traitors Ireland Uncloaked

news.title: Tim MacGabhann: "I was never very good at maths, but I was good at a particular calculus – low effort, low energy expenditure, and a high yield of getting buckled"
news.summary: Tim MacGabhann discusses his compelling new memoir, The Black Pool, which chronicles his heroin use and eventual recovery.
